data.product_name: UnbuckleMe Car Seat Buckle Release Tool - As Seen on Shark Tank - Makes it Easy to Unbuckle a Child's Car Seat - Easy Tool for Parents, Grandparents & Older Children (1 Pack, Hot Pink)

summary.topics: carseat, granddaughter, daughter, seat, arthritis, unbuckle, buckle, baby, grandma, button, able, mom, great, her, hand, easier, work, car, recommend, she, shes, very, use, really, product, device, help, this, it, bought, unbuckleme, love, my, perfect, try, thing, still, little, herself, one, easy, with, make, made, old, ha, and first

price.review: The UnbuckleMe is just...OK. It might be worth $5, but definitely not the $15 that I paid for it. Its a bit awkward to get in place and push down, especially with your kid in the seat. I bought it for my wife who has a hard time pushing the release button. She used it once and now it just sits in the storage pocket in the car door.

At first I was skeptical about paying $$ for a tiny piece of plastic but with preschool and elementary carpool everyday, it ha been so worth it. We even bought a second so my 3 and 6 year old can each keep it in their carseat cup holder.
I returned this item, I didn't even use it. Felt it would not have lasted long considering the how much i would use it
This is a waste of money... it is too hard to use

durable.review: I really love this item! I can now maintain my beautiful nails without being worried that they will break anytime Im taking my little one out of her car seat. Will be purchasing more for friends.
Had this for a little while now.  Took my 4 year old a second to figure it out, but it works great.  Why didn't they have this when I was a kid?  And the bright color helps it not get lost.

When i saw this on shark tank I was super excited to use it. Now that I do in person drop off I thought it would be great to help my daughter unbuckle her car seat. But it was still the same amount of difficulty I did go back and saw it was for parents but just not what I needed it for.

Heavy duty thick plastic that is easy for me and my five year old to use to unbuckle his seat. He was able to undo the top buckle by himself but struggled getting the bottom buckle undone and this tool has enabled him to do the whole thing by himself! We love it!
It works. I usually have long nails and wasn't able to unbuckle my daughter without hurting myself. This really saved my knuckles.

easy.review: Bought this so that my 4 1/2 yr old could undo her bottom buckle herself and gain a little more independence like she wanted. It was so easy for her to do! She loves it and so do I
My daughter is 5 and is still in a 5 point and will be in it for a long time since she is quite petite. She is excited that she can now help and get herself out of the seat!

We recently flipped our kiddo forward facing, and are trying to train her to unbuckle on her own, but she is a little weaker in her hands.  She only had to try twice before figuring it out on her own and can use it every time! Amazing life changer purchase!
Its as hard to use as pushing the button on the car seat
Great for grandparents making the child restraint easy to release

I brought this genius invention to help my kids unbuckle themselves, very easy for them to use! This UnbuckleMe product is also great for when I get my nails done, it allows me to easily get my newborn out of his carseat!

We bought a few of these to try for my daughter to unbuckle herself in the carpool line. This one was our least favorite and she really cant use it. If you find the one that is only sold in yellow, that latches onto the seat buckle itself- spend your money there first!
Soo easy to use with my long nails.

This makes unfastening the car seat so easy without breaking any of my nails!!!!! I love it!!! I keep it in the back window within arms reach. Im going to give them at baby showers as gifts in the future!!! Every mom should have one.
I love it, my daughter has a hard time unbuckleling with her hands and with the unbuckle is so easy, specially when I drop her off at school.

I was absolutely amazed with the ease and quic release of this product.  It requires virtually no strength from my arthritic thumbs!  It sure takes the worry of transporting my grandchild away. This product is beneficial for any person who has any sort of weakness or injury in their hands.
Saw this on Shark Tank and decided to try it. I cannot believe how easy it is to unbuckle my grandson. Works great and I highly recommend it.
This makes it easier and faster for me to get the grandchildren out of their car seats.  Well worth having.... Simple to use
This is perfect for my 4 year old to get out of their car seat!! Easy to use!
Loved the ease of the product! I like to keep my nails long and this is perfect for getting my daughter unbuckled from her seat without any issues! So glad I finally got it.

Bought this for my MIL to use when babysitting my toddler. She has sore hands and is unable to unlatch the car seat buckle. This product works great! It's easy to use, and requires such little force to pop the buckle, so there is no strain on the thumbs.
Very easy to use. I bought this so that my 4 year old could unbuckle herself from her car seat and she is able to use it very easily, works perfectly!
Easy to use and perfect if you have nails.

This was the perfect product . It is easy to use, my daughter is now able to unbuckle herself. It looks like it is a good quality and hoping it will last. The only thing I wish is it had a chain or string to attach to the car seat so it doesnt get lost.
If you wear nails this is a great investment its so easy to use for my 3yr old daughter car seat i love it
Easy to use.

quality.review: I bought this for my mom. She baby sits my daughter, but couldn't leave the house because she couldn't unbuckle the carseat. Her hands are weak and slightly deformed from rheumatoid arthritis. She is a free Grammy again...lol! It works so well! Mom can unbuckle the carseat in seconds with this handy little tool. Such a great product!
Great for a grandma with nails! Just what I needed to get my littles out of their car seats.
Great help to get my grand kids out of their carseats with my arthritic thumbs!!  Will recommend to my friends!

It is and does exactly what it says. I am a grandmother and have been complaining how hard it is to unbuckle my granddaughters car seat! The unbuckleme is really great.... no more struggling. It also works well for the buckle on her high chair. Very happy with this product.

This was our second unbuckleme purchase... We bought one originally for our son who was having difficulty unbuckling at preschool carpool. He was able to use it on his first try! Weve had several friends with the same issue try it and all kids were able to use it on their first try! The only reason we had to buy a second one is because our almost 4 year old insisted she needs her own and it NEEDED to be pink!
PERFECT!
Where has this been for the last three years!! I have weaknesses in my thumb and it makes it so much easier to unbuckle my toddler. Best money spent!
I literally wanted to cry when I had to unlock my grandkids seats. I have arthritis in my hands and this tool is so amazing and works great!
It worked! If you need help with the button on the car seat harness get this.
This was extremely helpful to unlock my granddaughter from her car seat. I have arthritis in my hands & this is a God-Send. Now I can unlock her with great ease

I bought this for my mom who has acrylic nails and had trouble getting my baby unbuckled from the car seat. She uses this tool and 1 2 3 shes out and no broken nails, very happy so far and will likely buy another

Not sure about durability as have not had it long enough to make a determination. I have finger joint replacements and severe arthritis. This product does the trick. Easy to slide on and I can push enough to unclick red button.  I hang in on the back of front seat pocket so there all the time.  I have to say I think its a little expensive.
One of best inventions ever!  Saved mom/grandma hands.

I was recently injured and it effected my grip on my dominant hand. I take care of my grandchildren quite often and love taking them places but was struggling getting them out of the car seat.  This device is a God sent snd so simple to use.

I love this product. I am a grandma with a three-year-old granddaughter. I never liked taking her places because it was so hard to undo the buckle. I have nails, so I would try releasing the buckle with my knuckles or my thumb, but it was frustrating. I had bought another brand but this one is so much better and easier to use. I ordered pink, my granddaughters favorite color. When we get in the car she says,  do you have your pink thing grandma?  I would definitely buy from this seller again.
This is the best little gadget I have bought in a log time!  Works great, easy to use. Causes NO pain in my arthritic hands. Highly recommend!!

It works perfectly. Its a little tough to get it around the buckle but my kiddo doesnt seem to mind. It has helped so much with getting both kids out of the car in a timely fashion. I do keep it in the front and hand it back when its appropriate to unbuckle.
Great for removing those difficult buckles!
Love it! Recently injured my thumb, making it almost impossible to get my TWINS out of their car seats. No more screaming or struggling while I try to get them out.
This product is amazing, cant believe how easy it is. I recently started getting my nails done and I couldn't unbuckle my daughters car seat with unbuckle indo it with ease
I bought this so one of my kids could help me get the littler kids unbuckled. My 5 year old can unbuckle herself and also get my 2 year olds out as well. It's been a lifesaver!

My Daughter loves this thing! Wish I would have bought it a while ago. She loves being able to unbuckle herself. Also, god forbid she ever got locked in our vehicle, she would potentially be able to Unbuckle herself and unlock the door.
Life changer!!!!  Bought two and will be ordering more!  No more fumbling or broken nails.  I LOVE this product!

I just recently had a baby and to make getting out of the car easier I purchased This for my 5 year old. She loves that it's pink and that she can she can undo her buckle her self now. She has even used it to get her 2 year old brother out of his seat as well. Its a great product and I recommend it to everyone!

My daughter is almost 5 and still in 5 point harness. She cant get the bottom button released but is otherwise able to get herself out. We attached this to the back of the opposite seat with a little extendable tether so she cant reach it unless we hand it to her. When its time to get out, we just stretch the tether and shes easily able to get out. Great product. Just ordered 3 more for family members cars!
This product works so great! Make unbuckling so much easier or I should say, makes unbuckling possible!
Great little gadget!  Really saves my fingernails from breaking!  I keep one in the seat pocket. Great for getting my grandkids out of their car seats!

I love this now that I went back to long acrylic nails! I have two toddlers in car seats and this is a lifesaver when unbuckling them. I keep it on my keychain, so its always with me as Im getting the kids out of their seats, and it just makes mom life so much easier.
This is amazing. Was looking for a new car seat that was easier to unbuckle and this item popped up. I'm so glad it did. My only regret is that it took me so long to realize that it even existed."
I love that this tool boost my daughters confidence! Its super easy to use and such a life saver with multiple children.

I love this for unbuckling my youngest granddaughters out of their car seats.  My arthritis got so bad I had to ask strangers to help me.  Thats when I started to search to see if someone made something to help!  This was a great tool!!

Well-made product that is easy for all to use, even my 5 year old daughter can get herself out of the car seat now without me having to unbuckle her every time which is great for safety and convenience purposes.
So far so good. I have arthritis in my thumb and had a terrible time unbuckling my granddaughters car seat. Since I got this product a few days ago it a cinch to unbuckle.

We bought this because our youngest starts kindergarten tomorrow. Our schools will not unbuckle them in the car line (I don't blame them) and she is very tiny and was unable to unbuckle herself. She's been using this for about a month now and can easily get herself in and out of the car with no problem now. The only thing I would change is to have something that could easily attach to the carseat like a retractable lanyard.  Luckily she's super responsible and her seat has two little cubbies on it and she keeps them there. We have one in each vehicle. I highly recommend this thing.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I love it. My daughter has hypotonia ( low muscle tone ) so its a struggle for her and with this its helped so much. Shes always wanted to be a big girl and do stuff on her own. So this was perfect.
Works fine. I feel like the prong to push the button could be placed further down on the end to click easier. Slight hassle to finagle it around a toddlers legs.

My 3-year-old can unbuckle herself! I bought this at 36 weeks pregnant when I could no longer reach my 3-year-old's car seat to help her unbuckle in carpool line. She figured out how to use it in about 30 seconds and is so proud to show off her new skill. I like that it is kept in a cup holder or elsewhere and doesn't attach to the strap itself, since I worry that ones that attach to the strap could interfere with the function of the straps in a crash. It also gives me the option of putting it on a lanyard or something and only giving it to her when it is okay to unbuckle herself if she ever tries to unbuckle herself when the car is moving (which she understands is unsafe). It gives me some peace of mind that she can unbuckle herself in case of emergency, too. My mother-in-law, who has arthritis in her fingers, also ordered one so that she can unbuckle her grandkids after struggling for years. I wish we had diacovered this sooner!
Love it.. so helpful.. my mom no longer fears getting the babies out of the seat.
best gadget ever invented !
This has been the best little gadget ever for my long nails! Ive already told a few friends about it...

My mother in law watches my daughter and kept complaining about how difficult it was to undo the car seat buckles. I bought this to see if it would help and she hugged me after one use! We will forever buy it as baby gifts.
Very helpful!
Has been a life saver. Without it my mom could not unbuckle my daughter from the car seat. The Unbuckle me made it seamless. I have one in every vehicle. Worth every penny

Love it love it love it, wish I had this the last 2 years. I have terrible disfiguring arthritis in both my thumbs the pain was horrific when I would try and release the Graco car seat buckle it was so frustrating and unfortunately my child will imitate my frustration when shes trying to do something difficult. Now she sees a happy mom

I have muscle weakness and arthritis in my hands. The safety buckle connected to the car seat was impossible for me to unbuckle. I had to have assistance each time to unbuckle my granddaughter. This device has enabled me to open that buckle. I want to keep her safe at all times in the car. This tool is so welcome to have. My hands and fingers thank you for this unbuckle me device.

Bought this so my 5 year old could unbuckle herself. We tried a cheaper one that worked slightly different before this one and she couldn't work it. We bought this one and she was able to unbuckle herself on the first try. She loves that she can be independent now and I love that I don't have to get out of the car to unbuckle her when dropping her off at school and other places. (I have a very small kindergarten).
Great little gadget to have handy. Im due with my third and we put our oldest in the third row. Shes now able to unbuckle herself rather than me having to climb in through the back to unbuckle her.

I was having surgery and was only going to have the use of one hand. I searched for a product to make it possible to get my daughter out of her seat. I came across UnbuckleMe and decided to give it a try. I wish I wouldve had this all along. Ive struggled for 4 years with that red button!  I have relatively small hands and have acrylic nails. I often worried if I had to get her out quickly, if I could do it. Now theres no worries. My daughter can actually do it herself. The hardest part of having the UnbuckleMe is making sure it doesnt get misplaced in the car. It does have a loop for a key chain or strap. Every car seat owner should have one of these!!!

I got this for my daughter to use. I recently got a 3rd row car, it wasnt easy to unbuckle my daughter, esp at school drop off.. I ordered one hoping my daughter could use it to unbuckle herself & luckily enough, she can. She loves it & Its almost freaky how well it works. Id recommend this 100%!!

This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. I am also a grandmother with severe osteoarthritis in my thumbs. UnbuckleMe helps me in releasing the seat buckle on my granddaughters car seat without pain. THANK YOU for this amazing product!
Have Just received it. Havent really used it a lot yet. Seems like its going to be just the ticket
Im a momma that wears long fancy acrylic nails & my knuckles become sore so this was very helpful!
Great love it. No more pain in my thumbs and I get my nails done how I like and dont have to worry.
Absolutely amazing! Such a life saver....
Have long nails? This is the solution for taking off the buckle! Worth every dollar!

This product worked like a charm!  The buckle buddy provided my tiny 5 year old the independence of unbuckling rather than waiting for me to assist while shes a still using the car seat appropriate for her size!  This is wonderful!!
A great tool for parents and caregivers of toddlers especially women with nails or anyone with arthritis. Love it!
Great tool sure saves on my thumb
Best thing ever!! 4 year old could unbuckle herself so I didn't have to climb into the back of the van. Totally worth the money!
I saw this item on Shark Tank. Works wonderful. Just keep in car seat.  Would highly recommend. Perfect for grandparents

Absolutely love it! Ive always had a bit of an issue unbuckling my daughter car seat, especially with nails. This makes it so much easier, with almost no force needed with my own hand. Ill be buying more for friends and grandparents! Thank you for this wonderful product!

Saw this on Shark Tank. I have severe arthritis in both hands. Getting my grand daughter out of her car seat is more than a chore. I'm 6'1 235 and I can't depress that middle buckle  release button. I usually have to ask someone near me to help. I just received this & OMG, I can't believe I didn't think of this first. FANTASTIC! Both one for each car, used a zip tie through  the hole on it so I don't loose it. This thing is fantastic, plus.
Works really great . Very easy to use !
I bought this because i am a grandmother but due to the lockdown I have not been permitted to see my granddaughter. Judging from what I saw on Shark Tank, I am excited to use it.
My mother loves this. It really helps for amyone with arthritis or a weak grip.

I saw this on  tank and it really does work it is awesome I love it! Nomore broke nails and my mom loves it to so I am going get her her own so when she watches my daughter it is easy for her to get her out. The first time I took her to visit my parents my mom And I struggled to get her out of the car seat a week later I saw this on shark tank I called my mom immediately and told her to turn it on the TV we hung up and I ordered it right away it came in the time it was promised and works exactly as told as well. I LOVE it

This thing is awesome with one complaint, I wish it was more kid friendly. I bought this so my 5 year old can unbuckle herself from her car seat. She can do it about 80% of the time, but sometimes she cant get the button to get over the buckle release and that makes the whole point of the product unuseable. Otherwise, this is a good product that was worth the $15.
As an Occupational Therapist and as a mom, I love this gadget!
Excellent product! I couldn't get my granddaughter out of her seat after having hand surgery!  This product really works! Thank you!!
Love that my kids can now unbuckle themselves. They are 4 and 5. Excellent product!
I wish Id bought this sooner. By the time I found and got this product my child was finally able to do it themselves. I would still recommend it.
My 5 year old neice can finally let herself out of her hard to open car seat! Great product!
I wish I had this sooner. Carpool was a nightmare and this has changed everything!
Great for people with limited finger strength.

Just got it last night and used it this morning, omg makes it SO much easier to get my toddler out of his car seat!!! I love it! I have fake nails and Ive been having to use my knuckle to try to push the button and my knuckle was cracking and bleeding so this is sooo worth it!
Easy to use! Great product! Highly recommend!
I love this product! If I had to find something to complain about, it would be the fact that my coworkers were teasing me about it resembling an adult toy, but they're just dirty-minded, so...
My daughter love it and so easy to use
I had been struggling to put enough pressure on the buckle from the side. UGH.... this little clip saved me!! It works like a dream!! Thank you for inventing it for all of us Grinkys
I really love this! Its a must have.

I bought this because I have a toddler and sometimes the buckle is just hard to come lose and I am 30. This is for younger and older people who have their grandkids with them. I am glad they came up with something like this.

Would be great for grandparents, siblings, or for use in an emergency. We keep ours in the door pocket so my daughter can't get it, but it's still easily accessible. The plastic feels sturdy and it works beautifully. Should it ever break, I'll be buying another one!

I was not sure if this was going to be all gimmick and not functional and was very happy that it is very functional and works as well as advertised. We keep in in the car and both mom and grandma love this!
Very nicely made!

I bought this to help my five year old unbuckle herself at school drop off and its been an amazing solution! She loves her new independence and I love that I dont have to do a complete park and turn myself around in the car. I would definitely recommend the Unbuckle Me!
Love it ! Does exactly what its intended to, makes it easier getting my daughter out of her seat with acrylic nails

This is an amazing product. Wow. Ive been struggling with car seats for my great grands. Ive cried said unseemly things and even had to get them to crawl their the straps. What a life changer if you deal with car seats get one of these...or get two in case one gets lost. Thank you Unbuckle Me.
I love this little device! It's lightweight and so easy to use I love that I can just clip it to my car keys!
Excellant product, exactly what I needed! I liked it so much I ordered another one for my sister for her grand daughters car seat!
Ease of use, worth it. I have extremely hard time opening buckle, my grand daughter would cry because I couldnt get the buckle open. This works great ... no more tears.

I literally am in love with this product. I always have my nails done and have the hardest time getting my children out of the seat because I get long acrylics. This tool was a life saver it is so easy to use
Buy it! Seen on shark tank and bought before the end of the pitch! I work in chronic pain and have loved sharing this with my patients!

I purchased this item because I have RA in my hands & wrist and was hoping it works. TO MY SURPRISE IT WORKS BEYOND what I thought! My baby already hates the carseat and it was so hard getting her out while shes screaming w/o this product. Now it takes no time at a for me with this! ABSOLUTELY MUST HAVE!
GAME CHANGER!!! I absolutely love this little gadget !!! I will be buying one for each of my cars!!! If you have long nails this is a must!!!
This product works wonders! My 4 year old has small hands and hasnt been able to unbuckle herself till she started using this! I highly recommend!!
I really like this gadget! Lightweight and easy to carry in my purse if needed.
This is perfect for my 5 yr old who seems to not have much hand strength! In fact, this item allows my daughter to stay in a 5 point harness as long as she can.

Got this for my 77 year old grandmother who likes to take my toddler to school, but couldn't unlatch his car seat. She was thrilled when she tried it for the first time and it was easy and painless for her.
Love this unbuckle me! Its so easy to use and is not hard to operate! I get my nails done, and with a two month old in the car seat it helps tremendously so my nails done break lol.
This is perfect for my child whose hands arent yet strong enough to unbuckle herself when needed. She feels very confident using it.

The buckle on my daughters car seat is too hard for her to open and I need her to be able to open it in the car rider line at school in the morning. Twisting around to do it was killing me. We both love this product! It works exactly like it says and solves a problem effectively.
I'm a grandma with arthritis in my wrists.  I couldn't undo the buckle on the carseat.  This works great!. I absolutely love it.  A must have!

I am a Great Gma who helps babysit our 14 month old baby of the family.  I could get her into her carseat just fine, but trying to get her out was a different story!  Usually one or both of us were in tears. Then I found Unbuckle me~~  It is easy to use and works great every time.  I keep it in my purse always!!  It makes getting baby out of her car seat so easy now.  I would recommend this for anyone who has ever had trouble with the red button on car seats!!  This is just the greatest!!!

I googled is there a tool to help grandmas release the button on car seats.  Unbuckable showed up.  Its a miracle.  Its light weight  and so easy to use.  It fits perfectly on the strap.  I store it on the front seat console.  I recommend it to all of my friends with young grands.
I love this product whenever I have long/fake nails! Life saver!
It is so easy for my daughter to use
I love this product! I easily popped the buckle on my granddaughter's carseat and removed the two metal tongues from the buckle without any pain or difficulty at all!
Best purchase Ive made so far. I dont have to worry about breaking a nail.
I do have to open it up to fit my childs buckle but other then that its works just great!
Love this!!
Great for school drop off and emergencies
Bought a second. My 5 year old figured it out quick. My 2.5 year old almost has it down too.
Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Exactly as described and going to open it now to use it. I absolutely love it.
Very easy to use. Great invention.

This is absolutely amazing! My 4 year old absolutely loves using her unbuckler to help herself!  She understands that it is only to be used when she is told to by the grown up and when the car is in park.  We have one for each car to allow her to feel grown up! My grandmother is also able to use it to unbuckle her with ease even with arthritis In her hands.
Very use full if you are woman like myself with long nails!
Works so well. I got it cause it was hard to unbuckle my daughters car seat with long nails and this has changed the game.

Perfect for hot moms with acrylic nails. I cant live without this thing. I ordered extras to make sure I always have one handy. This makes it super easy to unbuckle the babu from the car seat without scuffing scuffing or worst breaking them! I think this would be helpful for caregivers with carpal tunnel or arthritis. I had a really bad case of carpal tunnel induced by pregnancy.

Ive had such a hard time trying to unbuckle my grandkids from there car seats. Ive tried various ways to do it to no avail. Finally I found this product on Amazon with good reviews so I bought one to try. I used it today for the first time and it worked perfectly and easy. I highly recommend the UnbuckleMe for any grandparent or women with nails.
Durable and easy to use when grandma wants to take the baby doesnt take much effort and super simple I just have it clipped to the back of the headrest on a shoelace so it wont get lost or misplaced

carseat.review: I am a Nana and really struggled unbuckling the car seat due to arthritis. One try and it worked. I love it!

Great concept. Wanted it so that my 5 yr old could unbuckle when t was time to get out of the car. Shes very independent and can buckle herself but cannot push down the button to unbuckle. Unfortunately it is extremly hard to get the unbuckleMe onto her buckle. Maybe her buckle is thicker than normal, I dont know. Its dificult for me to even use it. Great concept but not for my daughters car seat.
Amazing product, but doesn't work for our carseat buckle unfortunately. I wish there was a tested list of the ones it does work with so I could have saved myself the money.
With our particular carseat, you need to use the device twice to get my 4 year old out but I love that it gives her some freedom to get out on her own eventually.
Cant use it on the chicco KEYFIT 30 car seat.
It has made unbuckling the car seats so much easier when my thumbs just can't!!

My kid moved to the back row. Shes too light Weight to use the cars straps so shes still in the harness. This makes her feel independent while still in a safe seat. We do need to loosen the straps before she gets in and pull them, but thats an easy fast.
Horrible did not work at all for me I have a cybex car seat and its not made around that buckle wont reach in any direction so disappointed its not more versatile

Ok listen for all you moms that have more than one in a car seat you understand how long it takes to unbuckle our littles, buy one of these and problem solved it takes me less that a min to unbuckle my littles now I also get my nails done and it makes it extremely easier
My new car seat for great grandchild has a thicker button on it so it's still hard for me to get the release tool on it so I can push the button. .It's still a great product...
Its harder to open the clip than to unbuckle your child. This can only work for super slim buckles. If you have a thick buckle for your childs car seat, it wont work since its too narrow.

I purchased this product because I have nieces that I babysit sometimes and whenever I need to help them out of the car seat I struggle a lot because I have long nails. The only thing I would like to see is a new design that also helps open the second latch. I struggle with both!

granddaughter.review: I have been unable to unbuckle my grand daughter from her safety seat and this product made it so very easy!!  Thank you for inventing this device!!!

I was having a very hard time unbuckling my granddaughter as I couldn't get enough pressure with my thumbs to open the buckle.  This unbuckle me has made all the difference in the world.  I can now get her out of the car seat quickly, something I was worried about in case of an emergency.  I definitely recommend this product to anyone having trouble unbuckling a child from the car seat.
I am now able to unbuckle my granddaughter with ease.  No more struggling!  Great item!
I bought this for my 4 yr old granddaughter to use. It's so easy for her to unbuckle her seat belt now. After 2 tries she's a pro at it. I highly recommend the Unbuckle Me!

A child's thumb is usually not strong enough to  press the release button on his/her car seat, and this grandmother's thumb struggles as well.  So my granddaughter is now able to release herself when the car ride is over.  What a simple, wonderful invention.

I tried this for the first time today. I have arthritis in my thumbs and couldnt get my granddaughter out of her car seat. It literally took seconds to unbuckle her. I wish that I had found this months ago.
Granddaughter 6 yrs old loves this device. Grandma loves it too!
Can now undo the seat belt of my granddaughters car seat!  This has taken the anxiety out of picking her up from daycare.  Thank you!!!
With arthritis in my  hands and my granddaughter to young to unbuckle her self, this tool has been a great help!!  Easy to use, my granddaughter can now get herself unbuckled.
My granddaughters, ages 4 and 7 love having a UnbuckleMe. They can easily get unbuckled by themselves. Very helpful for the school drop off line.

My granddaughter is five years old. I discovered pretty early I could do easily unlock the red button on her car seat. It is funny now the moment she also noticed when I had trouble unlocking the car seat when we came home after an outing one day. She starting yelling for her mom and dad (I think she was about two). Long story short I started looking a car seat key. Up until now I was using a different device that has started to wear out. I Love this UnbuckleMe Car Seat Release Tool. It is more stream lined, light weight, and easier to use. I can both sides of the lock unbuckled at the same time! Question: Do you make more colors?
We grabbed this for my six year old to be able to unbuckle herself in carpool. It works fantastic and she loves it! She also loves that it is pink!
Perfect for my 5 year old to get herself out of her harnessed carseat!
My little loves this. The buckle on the car seat is horrendous. She loves being able to do it herself.

daughter.review: If you have one of those really tricky/difficult buckles, then you'll appreciate the UnBuckle Me!  Otherwise, probably not. I was super excited to get the UnBuckle Me for our daughter to use right away on our Christmas road trip, and she did, but now she never uses it. "Can't teach an old dog new tricks".  For it to be most effective there is a SLIGHT learning curve, and she wants it to work her way or no way. It will release the buckle...at least one side...if you place it correctly and just press against their body, but it works best & releases both buckles if you hold the device front & back, then squeeze.  So it doesn't reduce the work to unbuckle, but does reduce the required force.  She figures she'll just keep using her fingers instead of an additional, slightly cumbersome device. If she were using it, the durability of plastic in our cold ND winters is a concern.  I could see a typically child, almost innocently, busting it at the bend.
My daughter can unbuckle her own car seat now
My 4 y/o daughter can't open an applesauce pouch or anything like that, but she can use this! She thinks it's fun. And I'm all for helping her do stuff herself. Great purchase!
I bought this to help my daughters and I unbuckle her seat easier. Its not very easy to use and doesnt work like I was hoping.

I think its a great idea and it works great once in place but its a tad bit challenging to get it into place without pinching the babys leg. At least I dont have to worry about breaking a nail. I also wish this already came with a clasp or key ring like some of the others, I had to find one so I could clip it and have it when I need it.
My 5 year old was so excited to receive her unbuckle me. Shes thrilled to be independent in her car seat. It will help us out greatly in carpool for kindergarten.

I trust my 5 year old to get herself out of her car seat once weve arrived at our destination; shes in a 5 point harness, high back booster. We have 19 month old twins in the middle row, and big sister in the back. Its hard for me to reach the 3rd row to unbuckle, so this little gadget is a game changer as shes able to use it herself!
Great product. My daughter is able to get out of her carseat by herself
My 6 year old daughter can unbuckle herself so quickly and easily now. It was always so hard on  her hands to try to and do it by herself but not with this handy gadget! Total game changer;)
My 4 year old daughter loves and it is great for her to be able to unbuckle herself.
My 5 year old can now get out herself. She had a terrible time getting out. Wish I had this a long time ago.
Totally worth it. Finally, my kiddo can unbuckle herself! Her hands were too weak to unbuckle her carseat by herself. This makes my life so much easier now that she can unbuckle herself.
My daughters were too small and weak to use this device and she is 5, i would not recommend it to others.
Arthritis in my thumb joint made it very difficult to press down on the car seat button to release the harness. This device has made it so much easier. I highly recommend.
Was able to push the red button on granddaughters car seat...yeah!!

I bought this for my 4 year old daughter who will need to be able to get herself out of her car seat for preschool drop off this year. I verbally told her how to use it and she was able to figure it out on her first attempt.
Tried this product after another similar product didnt work for us. Easy to use and my 5 year old can unbuckle herself from the third row!
Got for my daughter because she has long nails. She has a baby and is constantly taking her in and out of the car seat. Now with this new release devise it painless.
Grandaughter has different kind and works well, this one not so much
My daughter loves it! It makes it much easier for her to get out of her car seat on her own.

This tool works great! With a new baby coming, I needed to have my 4 year old daughter unbuckle herself. She can now unbuckle herself and her 1 year old sister !! Makes a little part of life so much easier!! She doesnt like to work at things either- so I know it takes most of the challenge out of unbuckling!!

My daughter is delighted that she can finally let herself out of her car seat. As an older child who still needs the five-point, this allows her more freedom and independence. I wish we had known about and purchased this a year or two ago!
We bought the unbuckle me for our 4 year old daughter so she can unbuckle herself when getting out of the car. WHAT A LIFESAVER!

My three year old was absolutely thrilled when this came in the mail and I explained what it was for. She has struggled with the red button on her seat for months since she first started trying to get herself out of the car like her big girl older sister. When her little fingers werent strong enough she eventually would just become so frustrated she would give up. But now she keeps this in the side of the door and can get herself unbuckled with no assistance in just a few seconds! Awesome invention!

seat.review: My kids can unbuckle themselves now, in the 3rd row. Makes my life easier.
Too soft and doesnt work very good
Dont really understand how to use it. I have a bad hand.

Must have if you have long nails. I would keep my nails short since I couldn't undo to seat. Now my nails are where I want them & I can get the granddaughter out. Just remember not to leave it on the carseat. Toddlers can figure it out.
Too hard to use for someone that doesnt have a whole lot of hand strength.

update: By the end of the day 5.5 year old learned how to use this and can get out of the seat independently! woohoo! game changer- hes in the third row of our minivan and were expecting our 3rd baby in a few weeks, so this is a huge relief. previous: still trying to teach 5.5yr old how to use this- so far he cant quite release the button with it. will update review if this changes!

arthritis.review: Perfect tool for moms who want to rock longer nails but have trouble unbuckling their kids. I attached it to my keys. Super easy to use.

What a fantastic invention! I am a new grandma with thumb arthritis, and opening the buckle on my grand daughters car seat was next to impossible for me.  This little device was the best purchase ever!  No effort, I simply place it over the buckle,  press down and the buckle unlocks!  I ordered two and Ill keep one in my daughters car and one in mine.  I may actually buy more for the strollers too.  Youve made a happy grandma even happier!
This is a great tool for grandparents or anyone with arthritis in their hands making it difficult to press the release button. Sometimes I let my 5 year old use it and she loves it too.
Just what I needed with my arthritis!
I really like this unbuckler for my mom, who has arthritis, however, because it didnt have something to clip it or connect it to the seat, it got lost quickly and forgotten.
Bought it for my grandma who has arthritis. It helps her unbuckle both my babies with ease
Great for Seniors with arthritus issues.

So happy to receive this product.  I watch my grandkids and getting them out of the car seat was so hard, I have arthritis in my hands and it was impossible to unbuckle the car seats some days.  This product has changed that completely, very satisfied.
Love this product. It has been a godsend for me as I have a 6 month old and Ive recently been diagnosed with RA.

review_types.best_review: I am a Great Gma who helps babysit our 14 month old baby of the family.  I could get her into her carseat just fine, but trying to get her out was a different story!  Usually one or both of us were in tears. Then I found Unbuckle me~~  It is easy to use and works great every time.  I keep it in my purse always!!  It makes getting baby out of her car seat so easy now.  I would recommend this for anyone who has ever had trouble with the red button on car seats!!  This is just the greatest!!!
review_types.worst_review: Horrible did not work at all for me I have a cybex car seat and its not made around that buckle wont reach in any direction so disappointed its not more versatile
review_types.neutral: My daughter can unbuckle her own car seat now
